New Records: Yashasvi Jaiswal and Shubman Gill have helped India to a historic 10 wicket victory against the hosts at Harare Sports Stadium
Key Match Events: Yashasvi Jaiswal finishes things off in style as he hits a boundary of Muzarbani to help team India secure a 10 wicket victory in Harare
Skipper Shubman Gill played an excellent anchor role as he carefully balanced his defence with aggression
India are on the cusp of victory after an all out attack by Shubman and Jaiswal in the 15th over
Pre-Game Insights: India look to secure the series by taking a 3-1 lead in the 5-match T20I series
Ruturaj Gaikwad is the top run-scorer in the tournament so far with 133 runs and an average of 66.50
Rinku Singh has the best strike rate of 196.00, followed by Abhishek at 183.33 and Brian Bennett at 179.31
Post-Match Reflections: No surprises here, Yashasvi Jaiswal's brilliant 93 run knock today has earned him the title of Man of the Match
While Jaiswal did not get the milestone of a century, Jaiswal's 93 run knock helped the Men in Blue win the series
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's Playing XI: Yashasvi Jaiswal, Shubman Gill, Abhishek Sharma, Ruturaj Gaikwad, Sanju Samson, Rinku Singh, Shivam Dube, Washington Sundar, Ravi Bishnoi, Tushar Deshpande, Khaleel Ahmed

Zimbabwe's Playing XI: Wessly Madhevere, Tadiwanashe Marumani, Brian Bennett, Dion Myers, Sikandar Raza(c), Johnathan Campbell, Faraz Akram, Clive Madande (w), Richard Ngarava, Blessing Muzarabani, Tendai Chatara
